name: Run Chicken Run (hj2118, Anik Barua, GameDevelopment123)
name_original: Run Chicken Run (hj2118, Anik Barua, GameDevelopment123)
description:
Summary: The game is based on a fictional story where a farmer is looking for his chickens that ran away in various environments.  The levels are based on collecting chickens but other objectives are important like damage score, gathering eggs and save yourself from different enemies (snakes, fox, crocodile that attacks the player). Player can kill the enemies through shooting and some enemies will shoot back or even follow the player. You can jump obstacles to travel and player's goal is to find all your eggs to go to the next level. Eggs can be hidden in special baskets and need to be activated and found. The platforms gets more complex with traps and gaps as your level increases.
